title: Impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on the incidence and the epidemiology of catheter-related bloodstream infection two years later
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): María Jesús Pérez-Granda, Almudena Burillo, Julia Serrano-Lobo, Pablo Martín-Rabadán, Patricia Muñoz, Emilio Bouza, María Guembe
